name: UWA Global Excellence Scholarship
description: Awarded for exceptional academic performance, providing partial tuition support for the full postgraduate study period.

name: Scholarships for Top Three Academic Ranking
description:
Awarded for ranking in the top three students each semester. The scholarship covered full tuition for the following semester and was government-sponsored. Achieved in: 
- Grade 10, Semester 1 
- Grade 11, Semester 2 
- Grade 12, Semesters 1 and 2
institution: Kaohsiung Vocational High School of Commerce (KSVCS)
